articles.author: Hayley Cuccinello
articles.title: Family offices ramp up deal-making in June with bets on biotech - CNBC
articles.description: A biotech startup backed by former Google CEO Eric Schmidt raised $56 million from investors including the billionaire family office that supported BioNTech.

articles.title: Prime Day Anker Deals: Over 30 Discounts on Top Mobile, Home and Security Tech Devices - CNET
articles.description: Anker is known for its reliable power banks, but it has also made a name for itself with excellent headphones, earbuds and home and security tech. Score them for less with these early Prime Day deals.
articles.content: Amazon's Prime Day sale brings around the next opportunity to score deals if you missed out on Independence Day shopping. Prime Day arrives tomorrow; however, brands like Anker are already offering d… [+3249 chars]
